name: Verify text of 'Terms and conditions'
description: Comparing the text of 'Terms and conditions' to a text stored in a '.txt' file
descriptionHtml: Comparing the text of 'Terms and conditions' to a text stored in a '.txt' file

labels.name: epic
labels.value: 'Terms and conditions' functions - These tests covers the validation of 'Terms and conditions' functions features accessible directly from https://lennertamas.github.io/roxo/index.html url. Also verifies the url is correct.

labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify text - Terms and conditions window's displayed text must match text stored in 'termsAndConditions.txt'.
